title: Wounded soldier

properties.name: description
properties.value: Wounded soldiers are found in the infirmary of Shayzien. They may be healed with a Shayzien medpack, which can be collected from boxes nearby. Healing a wounded soldier awards the player 0.2% favour with Shayzien.

content:
This article is about the injured Shayzien soldiers that can be healed. For the wounded soldier south of Death Plateau, see Soldier (Death Plateau).

Wounded soldiers are found in the infirmary of Shayzien. They may be healed with a Shayzien medpack, which can be collected from boxes nearby. Healing a wounded soldier awards the player 0.2% favour with Shayzien.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 March 2022
(update)

Healing the wounded Shayzien soldier now grant 0.2% favour instead of 0.1%.

16 June 2021
(update)
  • Minor grammatical changes were made in wounded soldier's dialogues.
  • Their examine text was updated; previously, it was "Look's like [he/she]'s taken damage in the service of [her/his] city."

'''Wounded soldiers''' are found in the [[infirmary]] of [[Shayzien]]. They may be healed with a [[Shayzien medpack]], which can be collected from boxes nearby. Healing a wounded soldier awards the player 0.2% [[favour]] with Shayzien.
